description: It's that time of year again! St Patrick's Day is just around the corner, and if you're looking for a light, reviving drink recipe to serve at your party this weekend, we've got it.This Sparkling Green&nbsp;Sangria recipe features grapes, green apples, slices of lemon, and lime—all fresh fruits perfect for celebrating the Irish holiday. The best part? Sparkling Green Sangria is almost like a spa drink with&nbsp;white wine added in too!
